article: A businessman was deep in debt and could see no way out. He sat on the park chair, with _ in hands, wondering if anything could save his company from _ . Suddenly an old man appeared before him and was willing to _ him help. He asked the man his name, wrote out a check, and pushed it into his hand saying, " _ me here exactly one year from today, and you can pay me back at that time." Then he turned and disappeared as _ as he had come. The businessman saw a check for $500, 000 in his hand, which was _ by John D. Rockefeller, one of the _ men in the world! "I can remove my money worries _ !" he realized. But the man decided to put the check in his safe, _ it might give him the strength to find out a way to save his business. With a renewed _ attitude, he thought of some new business ideas which soon led to his success in several big _ . Within a few months, he was out of debt and making _ once again. Exactly one year _ , he returned to the park with the check. At the time they have agreed on, the old man _ , too. But just as the man was about to hand back the check and share his _ story, a nurse came running up and _ the old man. She said the old man was always _ from the rest room and telling people he was John D. Rockefeller. Then she led the old man away _ the arm hurriedly. The man just stood there, _ . Suddenly, he realized that it wasn't the money _ his self-confidence that gave him the power to achieve anything he went after.
